name: Iris (RavenBP)
description:
Iris is a puzzle-platformer game made for the Midterm Game Jam (Color Changes Everything) for GAME3033 at George Brown College.

The player needs to find their pet rabbit after waking up in a strange world.

Using the environment, the player must determine which colour they should or should not touch.

GitHub - https://github.com/RavenBP/GAME3033-Midterm

Controls

W - Forwards

S - Backwards

A - Left

D - Right

Spacebar - Jump

Escape/P - Pause (Some browsers may interfere with escape key)

Mouse - Camera

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Character Model/Animation - Mixamo.com

Rabbit Model/Animation - Niwashi Games

Particle Effects - Synty Studios

Game Over Theme - Music by Cleyton Kauffman - https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
